results.title: Little girl Jaed
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This drama recounts a girl’s tragic journey of drug addiction. Feelings of isolation and loneliness mount as a girl struggles with everyday life - at school and at home. Her friends begin to reject her, as her family does when they can no longer cope with her behaviour. As she tries to come to grips with her dependency, her family bond comes to breaking point and she is eventually thrown out of the family home. A bleak story of how drug addiction can ruin a person’s life.

results.title: Light a candle
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This documentary recounts the story of a woman’s horrific past experiences of the Holocaust. Photographs and interviews are part of this film which highlights the fact that no matter how abominably bad Nazis treated the Jews during World War 2, this woman’s unshakeable faith in her Jewish faith and identity as part of the Jewish race remains strong. A moving story about a race surviving against all odds.

results.title: A Haunted school
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This moving picture describes bizarre events at a school. A girl goes missing and two detectives set out to find her. Once in the school they turn into students and are horrified when they experience ghostly sightings of the victim. They suffer mortal wounds and turn on each other as they are scared out of their wits. Finally they themselves become possessed and are forever trapped at the school, never to escape.

results.title: Dick Sharp and the case of the missing white-out
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Private eye Dick Sharp gets embroiled in mystery, corruption, big business and double crossing while he endeavours to find the criminal responsible for stealing all the white-out in the city. A 1940’s noir style mystery thriller.

results.title: Detention
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
Four students are being kept in detention for one hour after school. They are bored and cannot wait to be allowed to leave. The clock ticks slowly on. Finally the clock strikes four and they are free to go.

results.title: Crying within
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A narrative of a schizophrenic girl’s struggle to come to terms with her unstable mind and her wish to have a better life. She speaks of a faceless person, her other self, who goads her into self-mutilation and as a result suffers a recurring nightmare. A disturbing tale of the struggles of coming to terms with dealing with inner voices.

results.title: The Chase
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A fly is desperately fleeing from being eaten by a bird. As he is manically tring to escape, he thinks his time is up when he comes across a frog. Luckily for the fly, the frog is more interested in eating the bird! Just when the fly thinks he is saved from death, SPLAT!! on the windscreen of a moving car.

results.title: Caveboy meets Future Boy
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An animated short of a caveboy who gets killed by hunters and gets transmitted into a future world of violence and war. Robots are evil in this world and caveboy is saved from attack by Future Boy. They come together and escape from this world of fear by being teleported into another future dimension.
